thread.title: BAIT & Clarks Are Finally Giving Us the ‘Breaking Bad’ Wallabees We’ve Been Waiting For
thread.title_full: BAIT & Clarks Are Finally Giving Us the ‘Breaking Bad’ Wallabees We’ve Been Waiting For

author: Chris Danforth
title: BAIT & Clarks Are Finally Giving Us the ‘Breaking Bad’ Wallabees We’ve Been Waiting For
text:
Brand: BAIT x Clarks x Breaking Bad 
Model: Wallabee
Key Features: Rich suede uppers, sitting atop Clark’s classic crepe sole.
Release Date: Thursday, March 23 at the BAIT x Breaking Bad release party at the BAIT Melrose chapter store from 7pm-10pm, followed by an online release on Friday, March 24.
Price: $180.
Availability: BAIT .
Editor’s Notes: The Wallabee is imagined in a pair of colorways inspired by specific moments from Breaking Bad . The blood red “Felina” version remembers the final episode when White succumbs to a salvo of gunshots, while the “Blue Sky” edition is a nod to the bright hue of the methamphetamine crystals that Walter peddles in the show.
Both colorways are adorned with the recognizable Heisenberg caricature, debossed in gold print on full-grain leather hang tags. BAIT and Breaking Bad branding also feature on the insoles and the reverse side of each leather hang tag. Numbers are limited to 250 of the “Felina” version and 400 of the “Blue Sky” version.
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
